|brand = ALFA Network |model = Hornet |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -UB |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 1, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ALFA_Network_Hornet-UB |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = travel router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UQ2121 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR9331; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24K |cpu1_type_rev = (v7.4) |cpu1spd = 400 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406EM2I-12G; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = ProMOS;V58C2256164SHI5; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Accton |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt (Was)
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/30/2012 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |ean = 4718050301669 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00A8UKSE0 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P/N:14162022000"... and "REV:"?"01" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Likely OEM Accton / AWB (NPL003792)
"PCBA-Hornet AP" is on the label on the device in the FCC photos.
==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/alfa_network/hornet-ub On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
==Notes== Same board may be used as.. *AP121 :AP121U :AP121U-64 (16MB Flash, 64MB RAM version) *AWAP02O-NSR :AWAP02O-NSRC *EAP1124XS *N2-SR :N2-SRC *Solo-NSR :Solo-NSRC *Tube2H :Tube2HSMA *WISP-NSR :WISP-NSRC *Hornet • ([http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=99&ps=112 PPage]) :Hornet-SHB • ([http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=99&ps=104 PPage]) :Hornet-UB • ([http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=99&ps=50 PPage]) ([http://www.data-alliance.net/-strse-640/Alfa-Hornet-dsh-UB-Atheros-AR9331/Detail.bok On Data-Alliance]) :*8MB Flash, 32MB RAM :Hornet-UB-64 • ([http://www.alfa.com.tw/products_show.php?pc=99&ps=202 PPage]) ::Since 2015 a 16/64 MB version named "Hornet-UB-64" is sold. ::Its 16 MB Flash is a ''Macronix'' MX25L12835F and ::its 64 MB RAM is a ''Nanya'' NT5DS32M16DS.
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/alfa_network/alfanetwork_hornetub |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/alfa_network/hornet-ub |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ar71xx |subtarget = generic |arch = mips_24kc |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 19.07.10 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
